item.title: Symfony Microservices Architecture
item.description: Overview A complete microservices-based backend platform built with Symfony, using API Platform, DDD, CQRS, and JWT authentication. Designed for high scalability, modularity, and real-world enterprise workflows. Key Features Microservice separation: Auth, User, Employee, Department JWT-based authentication & role authorization Domain-driven folder structure Event-driven communication (RabbitMQ optional) Fully containerized using Docker API documentation auto-generated via Swagger / API Platform Database migrations using Doctrine Responsibilities Designed entire microservice architecture Implemented secure authentication service Built admin dashboard APIs for employee creation Implemented service-to-service communication Set up CI/CD pipeline for deployment Tech Stack Symfony 7, PHP 8.

item.title: Svelte Application
item.description: Overview A lightweight analytics dashboard built using Svelte, focusing on fast rendering and dynamic components. Features Dynamic components with #each and conditional rendering Locale-based UI switching (tc, sc, en) Custom tooltip implementation without Bootstrap Component-level TypeScript validation API integration for charts and metrics Responsibilities Architecture of component structure Implemented reusable components with props Added locale switching logic Created tooltip system Worked with dynamic lists and API data Tech Stack Svelte, TypeScript, Fetch API.

item.title: Docker & Kubernetes Deployment – DevOps Setup
item.description: Overview A fully containerized DevOps environment used to deploy modern PHP + Node + React applications to AWS. Features Single Docker image containing Nginx + PHP + MySQL (local dev) Kubernetes manifests for deployments & services GitLab CI/CD pipeline for automated deployment to EC2 Makefile for: Composer install Build Deploy Terraform optional for infrastructure provisioning Responsibilities Built Dockerfile with optimized layers Configured Kubernetes deployment & service YAML Added Nginx reverse proxy rules Created GitLab CI pipeline for build → push → deploy Deployed to AWS EC2 via kubectl Tech Stack Docker, Kubernetes, AWS EC2, GitLab CI/CD, Makefile, Nginx.

item.title: WordPress Bedrock + Sage Theme Website
item.description: Overview A full WordPress website built using the Bedrock structure and the Sage Blade-based theme to achieve a modern, modular, and secure development workflow. Features Blade templating system Composer-managed WordPress REST API with custom fields Custom menu click tracking Advanced ACF + REST integration Clean MVC-like folder structure Responsibilities Extended REST API responses Built custom post types and fields Implemented frontend behaviour with JS tracking Integrated Sage templates with Blade Setup Bedrock environment for both local and production Tech Stack WordPress Bedrock, Sage, PHP, Composer, Blade, JavaScript.

item.title: Node.js CLI Tool for Content Migration
item.description: Overview A powerful Node.js-based CLI tool for automated content migration between legacy CMS systems. Capabilities Folder traversal and file extraction JSON → TypeScript model auto-generation HTML cleanup and sanitization Bulk migration with progress tracking Error logging and retry functionality Responsibilities Designed CLI structure using Commander.js Implemented file system utilities Automated Blade/HTML cleanup functionality Added support for dynamic component generation Tech Stack Node.js, Commander.js, TypeScript, FS module.

item.title: React-Based Investor Relations Website
item.description: Overview A modern React.js Investor Relations (IR) website for corporate financial reporting, regulatory disclosures, and investor communications. Features Dynamic pages generated using JSON routing Reusable components for results, financial statements, filings API integrated for disclosures such as: Annual Reports Earnings Releases Press Announcements SEO-ready & mobile-optimized layout Light and fast UI using modern React hooks Responsibilities Architected the full UI component system Implemented routing using JSON-driven configuration Integrated with backend IR API Created reusable templates for financial widgets Tech Stack React.
